activities:
An. Del. U.S.A., Inc. and its subsidiaries and affiliates, including Deva, Inc.,Tex. Del. U.S.A., Inc., Cal. Del. U.S.A. Inc., Flor. Del. U.S.A., Inc., Hono. Del. Inc.,
Il. Del. U.S.A., Inc.,Neva. Del. Inc., Or. Del. U.S.A.  Inc., TOD'S Georgia, Inc, TOD's Washington, Inc. (collectively the "Company") collect personal information from customers at retail stores in the United States and transmits such information electronically to Italy where it is maintained on a server owned and operated by the Company's parent company, Tod's SpA. Only authorized employees of the Company may obtain access to this personal information, and use of such information is restricted in accordance with the Company's privacy policy.
personaldata: Customer data, human-resources related data, and off-line, on-line and manually processed data. Some of the data is originally collected manually, but it is transmitted electronically to Italy where it is maintained electronically on a server owned and operated by the Company's parent, Tod's SpA.
recoursemech: the ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program, operated by the International Centre for Dispute Resolution, the international division of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA): http://go.adr.org/safeharbor
